source("../Helper_functions/image_panel.R")

Fig2B = image_panel(path = "Figure_1/Control.Rps19b-GFP.40x.4_s3_5.tif", 
            colors_to_return = c("green", "blue"), 
            genotype_annotation = "RpS19b::GFP",
            red_annotation = "1B1", 
            green_annotation = "GFP", 
            blue_annotation = "Vasa",
            label_letters = c("B", "B'", "B''"))

Figure2 = multi_panel_figure(
    width = c(3*(2.0694+0.025)),
    height = c(2*(1.1837+0.025)), columns = 1, rows = 1, row_spacing = 0.025, column_spacing = 0, unit = "in")

Figure2 = Figure2 %>% 
  fill_panel(Fig2B, label = "", scaling = "none", panel_clip = "on")
Figure2
